title: Pre-Christmas Old Judge SGCs ALL SOLD
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Pre-Christmas Old Judge SGCs ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob
I have several on ebay now also although some have been purchased with the Buy It Now. Emails take preference trophybob@sbcglobal.net
First come first serve. Thanks for looking. Prices for each card include postage and delivery confirmation. Insurance is optional but HIGHLY recommended. One caveat, my scanner is not great but if you like the scans, you'll love the cards!

1. 1889 N172 Old Judge Jim Burns Kansas City GAI 5. GAI made no mistake grading this Excellent although this is a real candidate for a cross over. One of the nicest looking image cards I have ever owned in this set. A real beauty. $500. SOLD
2. 1887 N172 Old Judge Medoc Wise Boston SGC 40. Great contrast and dark image, really nice. $400. SOLD
3. 1887 N172 Old Judge Charles Brynan Chicago SGC 50. Very nice card with nice contrast and registration. $400. SOLD
4. 1887 N172 Old Judge Henry Boyle Indianapolis SGC 40. Great contrast and registration, sharp card. $350. SOLD
